files.name: task.txt
files.content:
Test Task 


Implement a file-reader app using angular 2+, any css framework.

1) File upload page that lets the user pick a file by clicking on the “Choose a file” button or (optional) by dropping a file to a drop area on the page.
Accept only plain/text files.

2) Uploaded file should be readable - allow to see all file contents in the UI. Make sure to not load entire file into the memory.

3) Page with a list of files uploaded by a user with meta-info (filename, upload datetime, file size)You are able to use any libraries and code samples from the internet or from your own codebase during the task execution.
​

Time limit: 2h

Good luck!
